name: Nick Armstrong
text: Greg is awesome! Made my meal so delicious! WILL BE BACK TO SEE GREG

name: Rhett Stubblefield
text: Best delivery pizza by a long shot.  I won't get any other if there is a Howie's nearby.  The flavored crusts are great, and the topping options are pretty big.  Friendly staff

name: Rajesh Subramanian
text: Thought I'd try something different after moving here recently. The pizza was not too bad, but they missed some toppings :(

name: Robert Talley
text: Good pizza. You get exactly what you expect with Hungry Howies. It is quality pizza with a flavored crust. It is good for a quick bite and better than your Kroger pizza of course but not gourmet by any means. It certainly won‚Äôt stop me from ‚Ä¶More

name: Cissy Croft
text: Great pizza at a good price.

name: rebel banning
text: First time eating here, was great pizza. Loved the sauce. Garden salad doesn't come with cheese. Overall a great place including service

name: Al Brown
text: Best Hot Subs around

name: Jenny Markow
text: Timely delivery but pizza didn‚Äôt meet usual level for HH. Crust was soggy, tomato sauce basically tasteless and toppings so bland. We were very disappointed.

name: Chris Welch
text: I love the asiago salad and spicy buffalo wings

name: Cheryl Owens
text: This is my first and last time ordering here. My entire order was wrong. I order bone in wings and got bonless. I also order Dr. Pepper 2 liter and got 20oz. My pizza was suppose to be deep dish and was not

name: ADCRE8OR
text: Their flavored crusts are very good; they should be promoted more!

name: Chad Houston
text: They have a roughly 50% rate of getting your order right.

name: Jarrod G.
text: Love this pizza. Large portions and lots of cheese. The various bread combinations tastes so good. Friendly staff and courteous. Super fast service and super fast deliveries. Try them out!

name: Michael Whobrey
text: Excellent pizza and the bread sticks were phenomenal. Price seemed a little on the high side, but not a bad value. Called in for takeout and they had it ready right on time.

name: Melanie Lien
text: I have been ordering pizza here for 8 years. They have always had great customer service and great pizza!

name: Eric Varona-Nava
text: Very disappointed in my service this time. I have been a customer since I grew up in Michigan. This location seems to go through periods of good and bad. This time is bad. Can't cut the pizza or the sandwich I ordered. Forget to bring my extra sauce. Then tell me they are out of the stuff after I complained already. Fix it guys

name: Emma T
text: Best quality pizza in town. I love how fresh the ingredients are and the app is easy to use. Lots of choices on crusts types and love their asian wings!

name: Jessica Robinson Horton
text: I've graduated culinary school, are the Chicago and New york pizza, still nothing beats my homemade until I ate here. This pizza is without exaggeration the best I've ever had. Everything and everybody was great and I've never a pizza so ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Carlson
text: We walked in after seeing their Instagram posts showcasing their garlic breads.  They have a few bread options, we went with the 3 Cheeser. ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Ferguson
text: Really good flavored crust!  Especially the garlic and sesame.

name: Krystal Nguy·ªÖn-Harush
text: Ordered a medium cheese pizza with feta, 10 traditional buffalo wings and a small Greek salad. Think they forgot or messed up with the order bc they couldn't find it at first. Waited about more 10 minutes and then drove back to the hotel. Totally chowed down after driving 10+hours. This meal hit the spot.

name: stephen edmonds
text: Nice people but howies seems to go a bit light on the toppings, not my favorite pizza, prefer little ceasers or pizza shack

name: JML
text: Their "medium" pizza was surprisingly small compared to other restaurants. Their pizza tasted ok but not great, and the marinara dipping sauce for their breadsticks tasted like I would expect if it had expired. The garlic bread itself was salty and delicious.

name: George Stewart
text: while picking up an order I over heard one of the staff say they haven‚Äôt washed their hands all day .? I‚Äôm confused on why anyone would want to eat from here knowing that. Very unsanitary. I refuse to feed my kids the food I ordered. Would not recommend to anyone. Rather eat from little ceasers than here.

name: Laceta Jenkins
text: Good pizza their just super slow

name: Michael Poirier
text: Being originally from the NE getting a pizza here in the South has been a struggle. These guys will customize your order from sauce amount to toppings.  Makes it much more enjoyable.

name: Diana Collins
text: Hungry Howies is not your typical pizza place,they offer delicious sandwiches, ect..all are awesome.

name: Ally Whobrey
text: Great pizza at a great price. Love the option to pick your crust flavor.

name: Haley Burgess
text: Love this pizza, food was ready from online order when i arrived. Staff was friendly.

name: Sharissa Sakcriska
text: This is the best pizza in the Ridgeland area. I always get garlic and butter crust. Only $5 for the small pizzas.

name: RJ High
text: Great food and quick service

name: Crystal Wilson
text: Good food great location

name: Shaney Williams
text: I love this place. The pizza is always delicious, never a long wait, and the food is always hot. I also like the oven baked subs here ( turkey club is my favorite). The staff is friendly and the prices are unbeatable. The next time you have 10 minutes drop in...its worth it.

name: Ashish Gupta
text: It base was too much thick & taste was also bed üëéüëé

name: Bram Lugh
text: That was the last time we get howies. The "buttery crust" was a weird tasting oil that made our mouths sting.

name: Ellechim Ltacnetocix
text: They don't deliver at time but the flavor that's good

name: Rick Lee
text: One of the drivers asked for sexual favors for a bigger tip!! Short kinda heavy set girl in a Chevy impala. Disrespectful

name: Mark Metcalf
text: Extremely well managed with consistent quality and service. If you're in the mood for great pizza, give them a try.

name: Dorene Robinson
text: Always good pizza, good delivery. Sometimes a little light handed with the crust flavoring.

name: She-Na mallett
text: Food is always got and fast plus the prices are very reasonable

name: FlavorMan
text: It's alright. Domino's is better

name: David Warrell
text: They didn't get anything right the last time I went there and there was a customer with the same problem trying to change for extra we didn't order

name: Sharon Rivers
text: Great pizza! Helpful and friendly staff.

name: AryaStarkfanpage
text: Cornmeal everywhere. The salad was very bitter and inedible but apparently made by the manager herself. I was not offered a refund for my order at all. Also, the delivery charge and tax combined brought my $7.99-8 order to $20. Only good thing are the breadsticks.

name: Taylor Poole
text: This is seriously some of the best pizza around.  In the last few years, Papa Johns and Little Ceasar's have started to taste like cardboard.  Hungry Howies rocks!

name: Shanel Kidd
text: Very friendly staff and the food is always hot and fresh.

name: Supa Smith
text: Just a cool place to get pizza. The guy is always nice. Prices are sweet. Check it out.

name: Monica Christine
text: I love hungry Howies pizza!  I love the flavored crust! There cinnamon bread is really good! They are always really nice everytime I pick up my pizza

name: Gregory Randall
text: Excellent customer service, and the flavored crusts are so good!

name: laurence allen
text: Cheesy bread okay

name: Jellyfish
text: THE KRUSTY KRAB PIZZA IS THE PIZZA FOR YOU AND MEEEEüòÇüòÇü§§ü§§ü§§ü§§‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Thomas Perigo
text: People were super friendly

name: S. Torres
text: Always delicious and hot. I highly recommend it!

name: Connie Jackson
text: Always great üçï!  Love their crust!

name: Haiden Blauer
text: Always perfect!

text: Good Pizza!

name: Terry Prideaux
text: Best pizza and the Best workforce.

name: Angelia Slater
text: Had some in Pensacila, FL. No comparison
